features.title: Hello World
features.description: This is the first model added to the project, I've placed it some of the most famous places around the world! If you find yourself in one of them, please give it a try! This is my way to say Welcome to all of my users!

features.title: Whale
features.description: A wonderful sea creature that will look at you from the coast, this majestic whale will swim in the next to you while you look at the sunset

features.title: Pioggia Nel Pineto
features.description: One of the most famous XX Century italian poetries will accompain you during this walk in the woods,
